text: My posylali kazhdogo poslannika lish' s tem, Chtob s izvoleniya Allakha yemu povinovalis' vy. I yesli by oni, chinya samim sebe nespravedlivost', Prishli k tebe i isprosili by proshcheniya Allakha I poprosil proshcheniya dlya nikh by sam poslannik, Oni b deystvitel'no nashli, Chto milostiv Allakh i (vsyako) obrashcheniye priyemlet
